scripts.build: cd glypht-core && npm run build && cd ../glypht-bundler-utils && npm run build && cd ../glypht-web && npm run build
scripts.site:build: cd glypht-core && npm run build && cd ../glypht-bundler-utils && npm run build && cd ../glypht-web && npm run site:build
scripts.build-wasm: docker build -t glypht_c_libs ./c-libs-wrapper && docker run --rm -v ./c-libs-wrapper:/src -u $(id -u):$(id -g) -it glypht_c_libs /bin/bash -c 'cd /src && ./build.sh'
